<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tongue Tether](/Feats.aspx?ID=2828) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Snaptongue Grippli](/Heritages.aspx?ID=176) heritage

</column>

---

Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands. So long as you can freely open your mouth, you do not need free hands in order to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40). If you have the [Long Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=2824) feat, you can Disarm, Grab an Edge, and Trip with your tongue at a distance that is 5 feet beyond your normal reach.
name: Tongue Tether
